content.rendered:
Fifth Canadian Chopin Piano Competition
Prizes

 

Junior Division

FIRST PRIZE: $3,000

SECOND PRIZE: $2,000

THIRD PRIZE: $1,000

Senior Division

FIRST PRIZE: $10,000
Airfare and accommodation to compete in the Preliminary Round
of the 18th International Fryderyk Chopin Piano Competition
A series of concerts 

SECOND PRIZE: $7,500
Airfare and accommodation to compete in the Preliminary Round
of the 18th International Fryderyk Chopin Piano Competition

THIRD PRIZE: $5,000
Airfare and accommodation to compete in the Preliminary Round
of the 18th International Fryderyk Chopin Piano  Competition
